constitution+1.title: Constitution +1
constitution+1.description: Constitution increases your maximum health and stamina.

strength+1.title: Strength +1
strength+1.description: Strength increases your melee damage and knockback.

dexterity+1.title: Dexterity +1
dexterity+1.description: Dexterity increases your ranged damage and draw speed.

intelligence+1.title: Intelligence +1
intelligence+1.description: Intelligence increases your mana regen and max mana.

wisdom+1.title: Wisdom +1
wisdom+1.description: Wisdom increases the experience you gain.

charisma+1.title: Charisma +1
charisma+1.description: Charisma increases your ability to negotiate and trade.

class_warrior.title: Warrior
class_warrior.description: The Warrior excels in melee combat, wielding swords and axes to deal heavy damage and knockback.

class_ranger.title: Ranger
class_ranger.description: The Ranger excels in ranged combat, utilizing bows and crossbows, and can leverage their skill to perform critical hits.
class_ranger.extra_description: +5% Ranged Damage, +2.5% Draw Speed, +1% Critical Hit Chance, +1% Critical Hit Damage

class_bastion.title: Bastion
class_bastion.description: The Bastion is a stalwart defender, specializing in absorbing damage and protecting allies with enhanced health and resistances.
class_bastion.extra_description: +3 Max Health, +5% Melee Resistance, +5% Ranged Resistance

class_bard.title: Bard
class_bard.description: The Bard is a charismatic performer who inspires allies and demoralizes foes, enhancing experience gain and improving trading capabilities.
class_bard.extra_description: +10 Village Reputation, +5% Experience Orbs Gained, +1 Mount Speed

class_wizard.title: Wizard
class_wizard.description: The Wizard wields arcane powers to unleash devastating magic attacks and bolster their magical defenses.

class_pathfinder.title: Pathfinder
class_pathfinder.description: The Pathfinder is an adept explorer and survivalist, skilled in resource gathering and enduring harsh conditions.
class_pathfinder.extra_description: +5% Stamina, +1% Pickaxe Speed, +1% Axe Speed, +1% Shovel Speed, +1% Repair Cost

frost_fists.title: Frost Fists
frost_fists.description: Learn to imbue your attacks with frost, slowing enemies.

arrow_speed_2.title: Arrow Speed
arrow_speed_2.description: Learn to increase the speed of your arrows.

draw_speed_2.title: Draw Speed
draw_speed_2.description: Learn to draw your ranged weapon faster, allowing for quicker shots in combat.

bolt_speed_2.title: Bolt Speed
bolt_speed_2.description: Learn to increase the speed of your crossbow bolts.

dodge_chance_2.title: Dodge Chance
dodge_chance_2.description: Learn to evade attacks more effectively.

stealth_2.title: Stealth
stealth_2.description: Learn to move silently and avoid detection.

crit_damage_2.title: Critical Hit Damage
crit_damage_2.description: Learn to deal more damage with critical hits.

crit_chance_2.title: Critical Hit Chance
crit_chance_2.description: Learn to land critical hits more often.

sprint_speed_2.title: Sprint Speed
sprint_speed_2.description: Learn to move faster, increasing your overall movement speed.

agility_2.title: Agility
agility_2.description: Learn to fall gracefully, reducing fall damage

melee_damage_2.title: Melee Damage
melee_damage_2.description: Learn to deal more damage in combat.

armor_shred_2.title: Armor Shred
armor_shred_2.description: Learn to bypass enemy armor, dealing more damage to armored foes.

ranged_resistance_2.title: Ranged Resistance
ranged_resistance_2.description: Learn to resist ranged attacks, reducing incoming damage from arrows and projectiles.

melee_resistance_2.title: Melee Resistance
melee_resistance_2.description: Learn to resist melee attacks, reducing incoming damage from close combat.

healing_2.title: Healing
healing_2.description: Learn to heal yourself more effectively.

knockback_2.title: Knockback
knockback_2.description: Learn to increase the knockback you deal to enemies.

jump.title: Jump Boost
jump.description: Learn to jump higher, increasing your vertical leap.

magic_resistance_2.title: Magic Resistance
magic_resistance_2.description: Learn to resist magical attacks, reducing incoming damage from spells and magical effects.

life_steal_2.title: Life Steal
life_steal_2.description: Learn to steal health from enemies when you deal damage.

tamed_damage_2.title: Tamed Damage
tamed_damage_2.description: Learn to increase the damage dealt by your tamed pets.

fortune_2.title: Fortune
fortune_2.description: Learn to increase the fortune of your mining, yielding more resources.

natural_regen_2.title: Natural Regeneration
natural_regen_2.description: Learn to regenerate health naturally over time.

eating_2.title: Eating
eating_2.description: Learn to eat food faster, reducing the time it takes to consume meals.

drinking_2.title: Drinking
drinking_2.description: Learn to drink potions faster, reducing the time it takes to consume them.

mount_speed_2.title: Mount Speed
mount_speed_2.description: Learn to increase the speed of your mounts.

charisma_2.title: Charisma II
charisma_2.description: Charisma increases your ability to negotiate and trade.

fishing_line_strength.title: Fishing Line Strength
fishing_line_strength.description: Learn to increase the strength of your fishing line, reducing the chance of it breaking.

fising_bar_size.title: Fishing Bar Size
fising_bar_size.description: Learn to increase the size of your fishing bar, making it easier to catch fish.

fishing_treasure_chance.title: Fishing Treasure Chance
fishing_treasure_chance.description: Learn to increase the chance of finding treasure while fishing.

axespeed_2.title: Axe Speed
axespeed_2.description: Learn to chop wood faster, increasing your axe speed.

pickaxespeed_2.title: Pickaxe Speed
pickaxespeed_2.description: Learn to mine blocks faster, increasing your pickaxe speed.

shovel_speed.title: Shovel Speed
shovel_speed.description: Learn to mine blocks faster, increasing your shovel speed.

reach_2.title: Block Reach
reach_2.description: Learn to increase your reach, allowing you to interact with blocks from further away.

entity_reach_2.title: Entity Reach
entity_reach_2.description: Learn to increase your reach, allowing you to interact with entities from further away.

luck.title: Luck
luck.description: Increase your luck, improving your chances of finding rare items and getting better loot.

oxygen.title: Oxygen
oxygen.description: Increase your underwater breathing capacity, allowing you to stay submerged longer.

sneak_speed.title: Sneak Speed
sneak_speed.description: Learn to move faster while sneaking, increasing your sneak speed.

tamed_resistance.title: Tamed Resistance
tamed_resistance.description: Learn to increase the resistance of your tamed pets, reducing incoming damage.

melee_resistance_shred.title: Melee Resistance Shred
melee_resistance_shred.description: Learn to reduce the melee resistance of enemies you hit, making them more vulnerable to melee attacks.

ranged_resistance_shred.title: Ranged Resistance Shred
ranged_resistance_shred.description: Learn to reduce the ranged resistance of enemies you hit, making them more vulnerable to ranged attacks.

weakpoint_analysis_2.title: Weakpoint Analysis
weakpoint_analysis_2.description: Learn to target enemy weakpoints for increased crit chance and damage.
weakpoint_analysis_2.extra_description: +5% Critical Hit Chance, +5% Critical Hit Damage

armor_breaker_2.title: Armour Breaker
armor_breaker_2.description: Learn to destroy enemy armour and resistances

fire_fists.title: Fire Fists
fire_fists.description: Learn to imbue your attacks with fire burning enemies.

blood_resist.title: Blood Magic Resistance
blood_resist.description: Learn to resist the effects of blood magic.

eldritch_resist.title: Eldritch Magic Resistance
eldritch_resist.description: Learn to resist the effects of eldritch magic.

ender_resist.title: Ender Magic Resistance
ender_resist.description: Learn to resist the effects of ender magic.

evocation_resist.title: Evocation Magic Resistance
evocation_resist.description: Learn to resist the effects of evocation magic.

fire_resist.title: Fire Magic Resistance
fire_resist.description: Learn to resist the effects of fire magic.

holy_resist.title: Holy Magic Resistance
holy_resist.description: Learn to resist the effects of holy magic.

ice_resist.title: Ice Magic Resistance
ice_resist.description: Learn to resist the effects of ice magic.

lightning_resist.title: Lightning Magic Resistance
lightning_resist.description: Learn to resist the effects of lightning magic.

nature_resist.title: Nature Magic Resistance
nature_resist.description: Learn to resist the effects of nature magic.

spell_resist.title: Spell Magic Resistance
spell_resist.description: Learn to resist the effects of magic.

spell_power.title: Spell Magic Power
spell_power.description: Learn to increase the power of your magic.

blood_power.title: Blood Magic Spell Power
blood_power.description: Cast stronger spells with blood magic

eldritch_power.title: Eldritch Magic Spell Power
eldritch_power.description: Cast stronger spells with eldritch magic

ender_power.title: Ender Magic Spell Power
ender_power.description: Cast stronger spells with ender magic

evocation_power.title: Evocation Magic Spell Power
evocation_power.description: Cast stronger spells with evocation magic

fire_power.title: Fire Magic Spell Power
fire_power.description: Cast stronger spells with fire magic

holy_power.title: Holy Magic Spell Power
holy_power.description: Cast stronger spells with holy magic

ice_power.title: Ice Magic Spell Power
ice_power.description: Cast stronger spells with ice magic

lightning_power.title: Lightning Magic Spell Power
lightning_power.description: Cast stronger spells with lightning magic

nature_power.title: Nature Magic Spell Power
nature_power.description: Cast stronger spells with nature magic

subclass_farmer.title: Farmer
subclass_farmer.description: The Farmer is a master of agriculture, skilled in growing crops and raising animals to sustain themselves and their community.
subclass_farmer.extra_description: +10% Stamina, +5 Harvested Crops, +10% Natural Regeneration, +10% Eating Speed, +10% Axe Speed

subclass_fisher.title: Fisher
subclass_fisher.description: The Fisher is an expert angler, skilled in catching fish and other aquatic creatures to provide food and resources.
subclass_fisher.extra_description: +5% Fishing Line Strength, +6 Fishing Bar Size, +5% Fishing Treasure Chance, +5% Oxygen

subclass_miner.title: Miner
subclass_miner.description: The Miner is a skilled excavator, adept at extracting valuable minerals and resources from the earth.
subclass_miner.extra_description: +10% Crossbow Bolt Speed, +10% Stamina, +10% Pickaxe Speed, +10% Shovel Speed, +10% Repair Cost Reduction

subclass_archer.title: Archer
subclass_archer.description: The Archer is a master of the bow, skilled in ranged combat and precision shooting.
subclass_archer.extra_description: +10% Arrow Speed, +10% Draw Speed, +10% Ranged Resistance, +10% Crit Chance, +5% Nature Spell Power

subclass_rogue.title: Rogue
subclass_rogue.description: The Rogue is a stealthy and agile combatant, skilled in sneaking, backstabbing, and evading enemy attacks.
subclass_rogue.extra_description: +15% Crit Damage, +10% Crit Chance, +10% Sneak Speed, +10% Dodge Chance

subclass_soldier.title: Soldier
subclass_soldier.description: The Soldier is a disciplined and resilient combatant, skilled in both offense and defense.
subclass_soldier.extra_description: +15% Melee Damage, +10% Armor Shred, +10% Melee Resistance, +10% Health

subclass_paladin.title: Paladin
subclass_paladin.description: The Paladin is a holy warrior, skilled in both offense and defense, and dedicated to protecting the weak and upholding justice.
subclass_paladin.extra_description: +5% Melee Damage, +10% Healing Received, +10% Melee Resistance, +10% Health, +10% Holy Spell Power

subclass_beastmaster.title: Beast Master
subclass_beastmaster.description: The Beast Master is a skilled tamer and trainer of animals, able to command and control a variety of creatures.
subclass_beastmaster.extra_description: +15% Tamed Damage, +5% Mount Speed, +10% Tamed Resistance, +10% Summon Damage

subclass_warden.title: Warden
subclass_warden.description: The Warden is a near invincible being, focused entirely on taking all the damage so their allies can take advantage.
subclass_warden.extra_description: +5% Magic Resistance, +15% Ranged Resistance, +15% Melee Resistance, +5% Spell Resistance

subclass_dark_wizard.title: Dark Wizard
subclass_dark_wizard.description: You have mastered the forbidden arts of blood and eldritch magic.
subclass_dark_wizard.extra_description: +10% Blood & Eldritch Spell Power, +10% Blood & Eldritch Resistance

subclass_cleric.title: Cleric
subclass_cleric.description: The Cleric is a holy healer and summoner, skilled in restoring health and commanding powerful summons.
subclass_cleric.extra_description: +5% Summon Damage, +20% Holy Spell Power, +20% Holy Resistance

subclass_trickster.title: Trickster
subclass_trickster.description: The Trickster manipulates space and energy, mastering ender and evocation magic.
subclass_trickster.extra_description: +10% Ender & Evocation Spell Power, +10% Ender & Evocation Resistance

subclass_elemental_wizard.title: Elemental Wizard
subclass_elemental_wizard.description: You have mastered the elements: fire, ice, lightning, and nature.
subclass_elemental_wizard.extra_description: +5% Fire, Ice, Lightning, Nature Spell Power & Resistance

subclass_heroofthevillage.title: Hero of the Village
subclass_heroofthevillage.description: You have befriended the villagers. They now see you as their protector and champion.
subclass_heroofthevillage.extra_description: +30 Villager Reputation, +10% Entity Interaction Range, 10% Experience
